hero.ability1: Ability Name: Tainted Ground; Ability Effect: At the start of your turn, you may designate an enemy minion slot. Minions in that slot have their Attack and Defense reduced by 2 until you choose a different slot.
hero.ability2: Ability Name: Aura of Decay; Ability Effect: At the end of your turn, each enemy character adjacent to another character takes 2 damage.
hero.ability3: Ability Name: Fury of the Void; Ability Effect: If you control no minions at the start of your turn, ensnare an enemy minion, preventing it from following Minion Commands for one round.
hero.ability4: Ability Name: Shifting Sands; Ability Effect: You may pay 2 Lifeforce to move an enemy minion to a different slot on its controller's field.

card.effects: Negate and destroy an enemy magic card.

card.traits: A minion across from this minion has its attack reduced by 2 and its defense by 1.
card.effects: This minion can attack twice. It cannot attack the same target more than once per turn. After each attack, it may move to an open friendly minion slot.

Once during each of your turns, summon a minion from your hand, deck or graveyard with a cost of 6 or less.

If this card is destroyed so are all of the minions summoned this way.

card.traits: Each time this minion deals damage during your turn, heal your hero for 1.
card.effects: This minion's attacks cannot be defended against. If it destroys an enemy minion, it may attack again this turn.

card.traits: Resurrect this minion from your graveyard by paying its lifeforce cost +1.
card.effects: Destroy this minion at the end of your turn. On death, during your turn or at its end, resurrect a minion with a cost of 7 or less from your graveyard.

card.traits: All enemy minions have their attack values reduced by 1.
card.effects: On summon, target and destroy an enemy minion.
Once during each of your turns, resurrect a 7 or less cost minion from your graveyard. The minion is destroyed at the end of your turn.
Summon a minion that costs 7 or less from your hand, deck, or graveyard.

card.traits: +1 attack for each spell you cast this turn until the end of the turn.
card.effects: Once during each of your turns, you may summon a 2-cost minion from your deck or graveyard.
Ensnare all enemy minions in a web, preventing them from receiving Minion Commands for 1 round.
Fire two ice bolts, each inflicting 1 damage and ensnaring their targets in ice, preventing them from taking Minion Commands for 1 round.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: When this minion destroys an ensnared minion, gain 2 lifeforce.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: On summon, ensnare a minion in webs, preventing it from receiving Minion Commands for 1 round.

card.traits: Gain +1 attack for each spell you cast this turn until the end of the turn.
card.effects: Inflict 1 damage to the enemy hero at the end of your turn, or 3 if you control 3 or more minions.

card.traits: A minion across from this minion becomes ensnared, preventing it from performing Minion Commands.
card.effects: When this minion attacks an ensnared minion, it gains +2 Attack.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: On summon, target and destroy an enemy minion with 2 or less defense.
Once during each of your turns, you may summon a minion from your hand, deck, or graveyard with a cost 4 or less.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: On summon, you may summon a 4 or less cost minion from your hand, deck or graveyard.

card.traits: Each time this minion deals damage during your turn, heal your hero for 1.
card.effects: On summon, you may summon a minion with a cost 4 or less from your hand, deck, or graveyard.
Enemy minions on the field lose 2 attack and defense.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: On death, you may summon a minion that costs 2 or less from your hand, deck, or graveyard.

card.traits: On death, if you control no minions, you may summon a cheaper minion from your graveyard.
card.effects: This minion's attacks during your turn also damage an adjacent target.

card.traits: While this minion is on the field, your hero takes 1 less damage from all sources.
card.effects: Draw a card once during each of your turns.

card.traits: On summon, roll a die. On a 1, destroy this card. On a 6, roll again.
card.effects: On a 1-2, gain 2 Lifeforce. On a 3-4, draw a card. On a 5-6, inflict 2 damage to an enemy Hero.
